de.crawcial.web.social

Class FbServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • de.crawcial.web.social.FbServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class FbServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This servlet manages the Crawcial for Facebook activities.
    Author:
    Sebastian Lauber
    See Also:

        public void callStaticLoader(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                             java.lang.String pageId)
                      throws facebook4j.FacebookException
        Invokes the one time loader for Facebook pages.
        Parameters:
        req - the http request
        pageId - the page id to be loaded
        Throws:
        facebook4j.FacebookException - if the Facebook connection fails
